name: get_scope_name
code:
def get_scope_name(self, ns: str):
    """ID: 2ba11a01-d630-4c46-a5f7-ff485df567c6"""
    while ns.rfind('.') != -1:
        rIndex = ns.rfind('.')
        scopeNs = ns[:rIndex]
        if self.get(scopeNs) and self.get(scopeNs).get_type() in [utils.constants.MOD_DEF,
                                                                  utils.constants.CLS_DEF,
                                                                  utils.constants.FUN_DEF,
                                                                  ]:
            return scopeNs
        ns = scopeNs
